QuestData.Title: The Voice of Goldrinn
QuestData.Description: Southwest of here lies the shrine of Goldrinn, a memorial erected in honor of the ancient wolf spirit and his contribution during the War of the Ancients.$B$BOur new worgen allies have been drawn to the memory of the wolf god - go figure! - and were in the process of cleaning up the shrine.$B$BI haven't heard anything from my contact, Ian Duran, in days. Can you fly down there and find him? I've got a bad feeling that Goldrinn's shrine is in trouble...
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Ian Duran near the Shrine of Goldrinn in Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Locate Ian Duran near the Shrine of Goldrinn in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: You're here to rescue me, $c? Thank you!$B$BNo, no, don't worry about the cage for now. My life isn't important. We've got to save the shrine, first.
